entry.title: Dennstaedtia christophelii (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the closest modern fern relatives to Dennstaedtia christophelii (fossil pictured) of the Pacific Northwest are tropical species from South America?

entry.title: 25 Water Street (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that 25 Water Street was designed to blend in with historic brick buildings that no longer exist?

entry.title: formally crowned (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the last Byzantine emperor, Constantine XI Palaiologos, was never formally crowned?

entry.title: Sylvia Bloom (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that having worked as a secretary for 67 years, secret millionaire Sylvia Bloom retired at the age of 96 and willed US$8.2 million to sponsor underprivileged students?

entry.title: Campbell's Soup Cans II (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a Hot Dog Bean screenprint from Andy Warhol's Campbell's Soup Cans II sold for $258,046 in 2013?

entry.title: Anna Burke (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Anna Burke was the second woman to give birth while a member of the Australian House of Representatives?

entry.title: Eagle-Dogtooth Provincial Park (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Eagle-Dogtooth Provincial Park in Ontario, Canada, contains part of the Experimental Lakes Area, a controlled area for conducting scientific experiments in lakes?

entry.title: a replacement player (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a replacement player was injured replacing an injured replacement player?
